author: Lane Florsheim
title: Magnum Photos’ Upcoming Exhibition Asks Photographers What ‘Home’ Means to Them
text:
FOR THE UPCOMING exhibition Home, 16 photographers represented by Magnum Photos agency were asked to produce a work that captured what the titular subject meant to them. The resulting show, a collaboration between Magnum and Fujifilm, opens at Milk Gallery in New York City on March 2, which also marks the debut of a book of the same name and an event series devoted to an exploration of the ideas and associations surrounding the topic.

The theme was chosen in part for its universality, yet the uniqueness of each photographer’s...
